channel.title: Pure Techno Underground
channel.description: All underground Techno show, presented by Electric Colour (Ireland). No pop, chart or major labels allowed! Songs are DJ mixed live (as originally intended), focusing on techno - deep, driving, modern, innovative, classic. Featuring music from labels Soma, Klockworks, Ostgut Ton, Ilian Tape, Mixmag, Resident Advisor, Drumcode and more
channel.itunes:summary: Top shelf techno - all underground, no pop. Each monthly episode will be DJ mixed live (as originally intended), focusing on techno - deep, driving, modern, innovative, classic.. Hosted by Electric Colour from Ireland - minimal talking! <--> Featuring music from labels such as Soma, Midgar, Fides, Modularz, Voam, SK Black, Klockworks, Drumcode, Ostgut Ton, Phantasy, Ilian Tape, Kompakt, Mixmag, Resident Advisor, Phantasy and more. <--> Music played will also be available in a streaming playlist on several platforms where available. <--> Mainstay artists such as Blawan, Butch, Skee Mask, Daniel Avery, Carl Craig, Architectural, Karenn, Temudo, Acronym, Blawan, Yan Cook and more.
channel.itunes:author: Electric Colour
channel.itunes:subtitle: Best in Techno music, mixed and hosted by Electric Colour

item.title: Underground Techno - 2021 Best Techno Festivals DJ Soundtrack - EP04
item.description:
EP 04. Underground techno. Soundtrack to 2021 Best Techno Festivals…

Tracklisting:
(00:00) – Street Tool#4 - Reeko (Global Underground)
(01:20) – Terraforming (Kraviz_Klock's 66 Interpretation) - Octave One (430 West Records)
(04:40) – Undulation - Edit Select (Soma)

(08:20) – Exsurgence - DJ Deep & Roman Poncet (Tresor)
(10:50) – Meta Reference - Temudo (Affekt)
(14:08) – With Patsy - Tessela (Poly Kicks)

(16:49) – Rigid (Kobosil 44 Rush Mix) - Rosa Anschütz (R - Label Group)
(21:35) – Nuove sessioni (Inland Remix) - Buck (City Noises)
(23:38) – Hapexil Rotator - Blawan (Ternesc)

(29:10) – Landing - Pharaoh (Parallax)
(31:50) – Come Clean - Sedvs (Mord)
(35:20) – Mutant Future - D.Dan (Lobster Theremin)

(39:30) – Body Shop - Aahan (Monnom Black)
(41:30) – Lox - Blawan (Ternesc)
(45:40) – Street tool#1 - Reeko (Global Underground)

Songs in this mix (or ones like them) can be found in the “ Techno Underground” playlist on Spotify primarily – http://spoti.fi/2ENC0di, but also Youtube and Deezer.

Shenanigans and treats:

  • Pure Techno Underground on Spotify: http://spoti.fi/2ENC0di
  • Electric Colour Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/c/ElectricColour
  • Diplomatic Enjoy website: https://www.diplomaticenjoy.com
  • Underground Techno playlist on Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLMniNzct9KeZsJpQoF_pdXwB0NQsF94Sd
  • Diplomatic Enjoy on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/diplomaticenjoy

item.title: Underground Techno - European, Uk, Berlin Warehouse - EP03
item.description:
EP 03. Pure techno. Minimal talking, DJ mix focus…


Tracklisting:
(00:00) – Rote 2 - Rote (BleeD)
(02:35) – Cubismo 8.3 - Architectural (Architectural)
(06:30) – Remember In Reverse - Simian Mobile Disco (Delicacies)
(10:25) – Turnhalle - Barker and Baumecker (Ostgut Ton)

(13:15) – When The Sun - Terence Fixmer (Electric Deluxe)
(16:35) – Aztec chant (Tessela remix) - Peverelist (Livity Sound)
(18:55) – Revelations in Dust - Deadbeat (BLKRTZ)
(22:00) – Sole Star - Polar Inertia (Dement3d Records)

item.title: Best Techno Festivals Soundtrack - Pure Techno Underground, EP02
item.description:
Best Techno Festivals Soundtrack - Pure Techno Underground, EP02


Tracklisting:
(00:01) – No Time - Sebastian Voigt (Outcast Oddity)
(04:34) – The Message (Dub) - Butch (Tuskagee)
(09:35) – A New Journey - Synthek (Natch Records)

(12:49) – XLB - Pearson Sound (self-released)
aka David Kennedy from London, England)
(15:21) – Sensory Deprivation - Oscar Mulero (MORD)
(?) – Josh Wink - Denial (L.B. Dub Corporation Remix)
- this is one of the ones that didn't make the video version, but it's fun, because it now IS the future. Spooky.
(18:28) – Safe - Ghost Culture (Phantasy)
- very under-rated release by one of the main chaps behind Daniel Avery's 1st album Drone Logic. You can hear that Korg Mono Poly sound on this one too, James Greenwood's instrument of choice

(24:57) – Volques - Amandra (Ahrpe Records)
- I believe this is vinyl only
(28:08) – Illuse - Alex Bau (Cocoon Recordings)
- I love the "end of world" vibes on this. The polyrhythm used here is awesome.
(33:16) – Focus (Rod Remix) - Truncate
(self-released by Truncate) this is a good song if you want to remind yourself to focus.

(36:51) – Ruins Of Dignity - Leiras (ownlife)
(40:20) – Sink - Ground Loop
(self-released) This is another vinyl release, from Melbourne Australia, and they have a Bandcamp as well with the digital.
(44:31) – Ardent - Kangding Ray (Stroboscopic Artefacts)
That label name makes it sound like you're examining something ancient, in a petri dish

(47:40) – Another One (Len Faki Remix) - Truncate (self-released)
(50:40) – Vision (Obscure Shape & SHDW Rmx) - Radio Slave (Rekids)
(Rekids, which is Radio Slave's label aka Matt Edwards)
(53:38) – Dwarf Planets - Dimi Angélis (Construct Re-Form)
This one is vinyl only. I like this, although it appears that not much is changing throughout the song, I personally hear all sorts morphing as the song progresses. Subtle stuff

(58:00?) – Moderat - Running (Shed remix) (Monkeytown Records)
- This was the original ending of the video, but for some reason this particular song (Running) is ban ned from being used on youtube so I had to re-render the video and upload the whole thing again!

Songs in this mix (or ones like them) can be found in the “ Techno Underground” playlist on Spotify primarily – http://spoti.fi/2ENC0di, but also Youtube and Deezer.

Shenanigans and treats:

  • Pure Techno Underground on Spotify: http://spoti.fi/2ENC0di
  • Electric Colour Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/c/ElectricColour
  • Diplomatic Enjoy website: https://www.diplomaticenjoy.com
  • Underground Techno playlist on Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLMniNzct9KeZsJpQoF_pdXwB0NQsF94Sd
  • Diplomatic Enjoy on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/diplomaticenjoy

(58:00?) – Moderat - Running (Shed remix) (Monkeytown Records)

item.title: Deep Classics To Cutting Edge - Pure Techno Underground, EP01
item.description:
Deep Classics To Cutting Edge - Pure Techno Underground, EP01

Hi welcome to Pure Techno Underground, a new series where we'll try and showcase some of the best techno out there and techno only. No pop fluff, major label garbage, just the good stuff.

Tracklisting:
(00:00) – 5.3 - Architectural (self-released)
(03:31) – Cold Welding - Woo York (Soma Quality Recordings).
(07:00) – Charming Sandworms - Ruhig (Midgar)

(09:00) – Kosmos in Deep - 3KZ (Fides)
(11:28) – En Lingun Lugar - Adriana Lopez (Modularz)
(13:10) – Rek - Karenn (Voam) which is Karenn's label, Karenn are of course Pariah and Blawan

(15:14) – Elqnt - Temudo and V i L (SK Black)
(18:45) – Planetary Boundaries - Acronym (Semantica Records)
(21:55) – Prospect - Deepbass (Informa Records)

(25:47) – Blind Mass - Tobias (Ostgut Ton)
(27:50) – Kalosi - Blawan (Ternesc) on an album called Wet Will Always Dry
(31:11) – There Is Hope - Dario Zenker (Ilian Tape)
(34:02) – Counter-clockwise - Yan Cook (Cooked)

Shenanigans and treats:

  • Pure Techno Underground on Spotify: http://spoti.fi/2ENC0di
  • Electric Colour Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/c/ElectricColour
  • Diplomatic Enjoy website: https://www.diplomaticenjoy.com
  • Underground Techno playlist on Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLMniNzct9KeZsJpQoF_pdXwB0NQsF94Sd
  • Diplomatic Enjoy on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/diplomaticenjoy
